title: So have people realized how OP Miss Fortune is yet?
body: or are ppl foolishly still claiming shes the worst marksman in the game/is just bad

replies.body: Her R causes mild discomfort compared to, for example, Vayne.
She is hardly OP. She is a mid game terror, but that is countered by her weaker late game.
It's only weaker if you don't use her OP mid game, which is 0% of the time.
I have never had THAT much trouble with her. And even if she does get fed it is not nearly as bad as Vayne or Draven getting fed.
I actually mained her up until a couple weeks ago. Believe me, she gets fed as well as any other ADC.
Oh she gets super fed. But it is not as bad as when a more late-game oriented champ gets fed.

She is okay.  All the Marksmen are in a viable position right now.  MF falls into the 'strong in lane, brutal mid game, falls off somewhat lategame' Marksmen pool due to the large amounts of magic damage in her kit that isn't affected by her armor penetration.  

So, I guess my answer to your question is she is neither OP nor just bad.  She is viable and strong in the right hands, and quite powerful in the correct team composition.

This is how I feel about Ashe. "He picked Ashe, GG"

Meanwhile Ashe's 54% winrate in diamond+, 52% overall.

> [{quoted}](name=finkypop,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=xUTAA4xs,comment-id=,timestamp=2014-12-17T16:20:50.356+0000)
>
> or are ppl foolishly still claiming shes the worst marksman in the game/is just bad

Since when was she the worst - she was still an ult bot if nothing else and that alone kept her from the bottom.

MF is my baby.  5 skins and they all hawt.

Nobody better in lane than her other than Draven.  And she has many viable build paths.  BT into Trinity, IE into whatever, Black Cleaver.  AP MF is even pretty good.

I remember picking her in my last ranked game last season. The rest of the team was certain it would suck. We lost, but it took a long time because I was hard carrying 16/6. The only other person on the team with more kills than deaths was my Thresh support.
I wouldn't call her the worst. It's all about getting that Q right, I guess.
